TargetBremFilter Class Reference

Class defining a UserActionPlugin that allows a user to filter out events that don't result in a brem within the target. More...

#include <TargetBremFilter.h>

Detailed Description

Class defining a UserActionPlugin that allows a user to filter out events that don't result in a brem within the target.
